name: The Last Stand (Geqwe)
description:
Logline:

A programmer makes a last effort to leave earth, before he is killed by an AI hunting him.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Left-Shift to run
  • Click to shoot

This game was created for Totally Ranked Jam, with theme the "End of the world"

Created by: 

Giorgos Kletsas
